overview:
Henry Harbury manages the 0’s and 1’s around here. He impresses his friends and family by claiming that he does “cross-platform software engineering and object oriented application design blah blah blah”. He impresses the rest of us by getting clean releases out every 2 weeks.

Previously, Henry was the founder of TeamTek, a software engineering consulting firm. Before that, he was at Responsys, where he led the analytics development effort. Prior to Responsys, he was the product suite architect for the ADM business unit of Merant, where his responsibilities included the PVCS products.
